ALTRUISTIC.Definition: caring about other people, not just for yourself

ARCHBISHOP.Definition: a bishop of the highest rank

ARISTOCRATS.Definition: people who belong to the highest social class

BANK BALANCE.Definition: the amount of money someone has in the bank

BANKRUPT.Definition: not able to pay your debts

BLOODLINE.Definition: all the members of a family over a period of time

CARDINAL.Definition: a very high-ranking priest in the Catholic church

COMMISSIONED.Definition: formally chosen to do a piece of work

COMMISSIONING.Definition: formally chosing to do a piece of work

CONSPIRATORIAL.Definition: relating to a conspiracy, a plan to do something bad

CUSTODIANS.Definition: people with responsibility for protecting something

DIPLOMAT.Definition: an official representing a country or city

DOWRY.Definition: money given by a woman's family to the man she marries

EXECUTED.Definition: killed, especially as a legal punishment

HEIR.Definition: someone who will receive money or inherit a name or title

MANIPULATION.Definition: controlling someone for your own advantage

MANOEUVERING.Definition: using clever and dishonest methods to gain something

MERCHANTS.Definition: people who buy and sell goods

MONARCHY.Definition: a state with a king or queen

NOBLEMEN.Definition: men of a high social class

PATRON.Definition: a person who supports an activity

PHILANTHROPY.Definition: the activity of giving money or paying for things to support those who need it

POWERHOUSE.Definition: very powerful country, city, or organisation

SACRISTY.Definition: the room where members of the church get ready

STABBED.Definition: if someone stabs you, they push a knife into your body

TENDENCY.Definition: if someone has a tendency to do something, it means it usually happens

UNDOING.Definition: the cause of someone's failure or decline
